item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

KURANGA DIGITAL LTD 

  _________________________________________________________________

Simplifying IT management, So you can Focus on your Business

Services

Accounting Solutions

Training and technical support in QUICKBOOKS. It records and processes accounting transactions within functional modules.

Web-based Applications

Modern, simple web-based systems and websites that look both stylish and clean in design, professional email address hosted and managed by us.

Digital Solutions

Run-to-failure, condition based maintenance, preventive maintenance or predictive maintenance strategy.

item.title: About us
item.dc:creator: Admin
item.content:encoded:
An Experience

We were founded in 2016 with a vision to bring the unique tastes and vibes of Spain to Austin, all with a focus on using locally-sourced ingredients.
